about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • RDF/LT (Rank 7 USA)

  • Premium account for 20 days

  • 2500 Golden Eagles

The RDF/LT is an American light tank designed for reconnaissance tasks. Thanks to its low weight and powerful engine, it is capable of quickly moving across the battlefield.

Armed with a 75 mm XM274 cannon and a coaxial 7.62 mm machine gun, the RDF/LT’s primary ammunition includes a XM885 APFSDS shell and a HE shell with a proximity fuze. With a reload time of just 0.85 seconds for the main cannon, this tank also features a laser rangefinder and thermal imaging devices for the gunner.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

  • RDF/LT (Rank 7 USA)

  • Premium account for 20 days

With a reload time of just 0.85 seconds for the main cannon, this tank also features a laser rangefinder and thermal imaging devices for the gunner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
